Package org.eclipse.mosaic.lib.objects.addressing

Class AdHocMessageRoutingBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.eclipse.mosaic.lib.objects.addressing.AdHocMessageRoutingBuilder
  • public class AdHocMessageRoutingBuilder
extends Object
    Central API for obtaining MessageRouting for sending V2xMessages via ad hoc communication.

        public AdHocMessageRoutingBuilder viaChannel​(AdHocChannel adHocChannel)

        this builder

      • geoBroadCast

        public MessageRouting geoBroadCast​(GeoArea geoArea)
        Creates geo broadcast to destination area.
        Parameters:
        geoArea - destination circle GeoCircle or destination rectangle GeoRectangle
        Returns:
        MessageRouting

      • geoCast

        public MessageRouting geoCast​(GeoArea geoArea,
                              byte[] ipAddress)
        Creates geo cast to specific IP address using a specific AdHocChannel. Note: the SNS doesn't support explicit addressing when geoCasting
        Parameters:
        geoArea - destination circle GeoCircle or destination rectangle GeoRectangle
        ipAddress - specific ip address in byte array representation
        Returns:
        MessageRouting

      • topoBroadCast

        public MessageRouting topoBroadCast()
        Creates a topological broadcast using AdHocChannel SCH1 and single hop.
        Returns:
        MessageRouting

      • topoBroadCast

        public MessageRouting topoBroadCast​(int hops)
        Creates a topological broadcast using a specific AdHocChannel and specific number of hops. Note: The SNS will dismiss hop value, since it only allows for single-hop TopoCasts
        Parameters:
        hops - number of hops
        Returns:
        MessageRouting

      • topoCast

        public MessageRouting topoCast​(String receiverName,
                               int hops)
        Creates a topological cast using a specific destination host name, a specific AdHocChannel and specific number of hops. Note: The SNS will dismiss hop value, since it only allows for single-hop TopoCasts, so if receiver can't be reached, within one hop transmission will fail.
        Parameters:
        receiverName - destination host name
        hops - number of hops
        Returns:
        MessageRouting

      • topoCast

        public MessageRouting topoCast​(byte[] ipAddress,
                               int hops)
        Creates a topological cast using a specific destination IP address, a specific AdHocChannel and specific number of hops. Note: The SNS will dismiss hop value, since it only allows for single-hop TopoCasts, so if receiver can't be reached, within one hop transmission will fail.
        Parameters:
        ipAddress - destination IP address
        hops - number of hops
        Returns:
        MessageRouting
